document.full_text: lars bjork of qliktech says a sense of order can send your company to a higher level. but bureaucracy, he adds, 'is where nobody understands why you do it.'
document.title: corner office: lars bjork: order is great. it's bureaucracy that's stifling
lines_and_colors: lars bjork of qliktech says a sense of order can send your company to a higher level. but bureaucracy, he adds, 'is where nobody understands why you do it.'
